title: SBF pleads to be let out 5 days a week for legal defense work
description:
Lawyers for FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF) requested Judge Lewis Kaplan release SBF 5 days a week, according to a letter reviewed by Bloomberg. The lawyers argued that SBF needs the time to work on his defense with his lawyers, which is difficult with his current imprisonment. While he remains at the Metropolitan Detention Center […]

The post SBF pleads to be let out 5 days a week for legal defense work appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin Spark: Outshining Stellar with its Unique Features
description: In the cryptocurrency ecology, projects that have massive utility and real-world applications gain the most traction. Projects with unique features and functionalities often outperform existing projects like memecoins with no or outdated utility. For instance, Stellar is a digital project that rose to fame by attempting to provide a means of storing and moving money. [...]
